solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public boolean validUtf8(int[] data) {--newline--        if(data==null || data.length==0) return false;--newline--        boolean isValid = true;--newline--        for(int i=0;i<data.length;i++) {--newline--            if(data[i]>255) return false; // 1 after 8th digit, 100000000--newline--            int numberOfBytes = 0;--newline--            if((data[i] & 128) == 0) { // 0xxxxxxx, 1 byte, 128(10000000)--newline--                numberOfBytes = 1;--newline--            } else if((data[i] & 224) == 192) { // 110xxxxx, 2 bytes, 224(11100000), 192(11000000)--newline--                numberOfBytes = 2;--newline--            } else if((data[i] & 240) == 224) { // 1110xxxx, 3 bytes, 240(11110000), 224(11100000)--newline--                numberOfBytes = 3;--newline--            } else if((data[i] & 248) == 240) { // 11110xxx, 4 bytes, 248(11111000), 240(11110000)--newline--                numberOfBytes = 4;--newline--            } else {--newline--                return false;--newline--            }--newline--            for(int j=1;j<numberOfBytes;j++) { // check that the next n bytes start with 10xxxxxx--newline--                if(i+j>=data.length) return false;--newline--                if((data[i+j] & 192) != 128) return false; // 192(11000000), 128(10000000)--newline--            }--newline--            i=i+numberOfBytes-1;--newline--        }--newline--        return isValid;--newline--    }--newline--    --newline--}
